name: Tri-Brigade Oath
effectText: Target 1 Link Monster you control; Special Summon 1 Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast monster with a different Type from your hand or GY. If you control at least 1 each of Beast, Beast-Warrior, and Winged Beast monsters: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up Spell/Trap your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can only use 1 "Tri-Brigade Oath" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
